hjb.misc
Class YetAnotherBase64

java.lang.Object
  hjb.misc.YetAnotherBase64
public class YetAnotherBase64
extends Object

YetAnotherBase64 translates byte arrays into Base64 encoded strings and vice versa as described in rfc3548. See RFC 3548

Author:
Tim Emiola
